caption: The wait was extremely long. The host, even though she was very kind she was overwhelmed and overworked. She had to do everything. But the food was delicious.
Waited 2hrs for a meal and only got an employee discount for $2, manager was on vacation and left someone in charge that didn't know what she was doing! Too many complaints from too many ppl
Food was really great.  Definitely try it.

FIRST TYME THERE! PARKING WAZ KEWL; DIDN'T HV TO WALK FAR! 40 MIN WAIT. IT WAZ AHIGHT, CUZ ME & MY HOMIE WAZ SITTING DWN! STEAK & LOBSTER, HITT'N , BUT PRICEY!😵 EVERYONE MASKED UP! THNX  FOR THAT! MEDIUM CROWD, NO BS!! WAITRESS FRIENDLY, & MEET THE OWNER. NYCE. I'LL BE GO'N BK SOON TO TRY SUM'N DIFFERENT! ✊🏼 P.S. THEY CHARGE GRATUITY FOR 2 PEEPZ! 🤬😁
Placed order for food... took an extra 30 min for them to have it ready...food is good

BEWARE! I really don’t understand how this was one of the very few places that were allowed to operate during lockdown due to pandemic and yet they are very careless when it comes to food safety and handling other people’s food. Very unprofessional from the majority of the working crew including management and owners! People who handle food during a PANDEMIC should take extra precautions while handling the food! NOT have their face masks off, not have their face masks below the nose and then talk when handling food, ESPECIALLY NOT touch their nose & face and then handle food that will later be sold to the public! When working with food, you should know the health risks and hazards of not following safety guidelines! I will NEVER again come to this restaurant! Overheard that the owner of this restaurant does not pay his employees! OWNER DISCRIMINATES! He steals from hard working employees! I do not support this type of behavior! I will definitely take my money and business somewhere else! As a business owner myself, I believe people need to be warned about the product/location they’re supporting! Please take your money elsewhere! Support businesses that do NOT put their customers’ health at risk, not discriminate against people, not steal from their employees, nor exploit their employees!
You guys dinner sizes have really decrease the last 3 times I’ve ordered from you
The food was good, a bit over priced, but it tasted like home cooked food, which for me made it worth it. The greens and Mac n cheese was delicious!
Food and service was great!!!
Food is always delicious. Prices are high but worth every price and never disappointed.

This place opened mid-pandemic, and with the crowds of people, I was hoping for something spectacular. The food prices were not just high, but oddly high for a place that didn’t look high class. We ordered a boil bag and a chicken plate with sides. The shrimp and crab tasted old and frozen and cost $40....I can get something twice as good at less cost down the street at Low Country. Besides the bad shrimp/crab, and the ridiculously dry chicken in the dinner meal, I would have had a more enjoyable meal grabbing fried chicken and a beer to go at Jewel-Osco.

Understandably prices have gone up with the pandemic but these are pretty steep for the food. Chicken is amazing everything else we ordered was okay. Including the $9 plate of plantains that were stiff as a board.
I got the special they had and it wasn’t too good. The Mac and cheese was dry, food wasn’t hot and the cabbage was soggy.
Excellent service and the most delicious plantains I've had in my entire time in Chicago. The staff is always friendly and accommodating, and I hope this South Loop gem survives the pandemic.

We were reluctant to try this place because it had so many mixed reviews. We ended up asking some customers how the food was here and they told us how great it was. I'm so glad we listened to them because this jerk chicken was great! The sauce was fire, it had a nice kick and the portion size was perfect for splitting! The baked mac n cheese was very flavorful and the rice and beans were the best I've had at a jerk spot. The gravy was bomb! The girl at the front was super helpful when it came to choosing an entree and we had our order in less than 15 minutes. We'll definitely be back.
Great customer service every time I call in for an order
Food was delicious and service was excellent

Please do not waste your time or appetite. I am extremely disappointed in my experience and I have tried all 3 locations as of today. Sadly, I will never return. I ordered the 2 meat combo chicken/lobster with green berms and macaroni. At the least, the lobster was the only thing that was good. The macaroni and cheese was ice cold, the green beans was salty, and the rice, I mean what rice. It wasn’t a full scoop of rice and the portions was not worth the money I spent. I gave it 2 stars because the lobster was delicious.

Sorry I really didn’t want to give that 1 star I order over the phone and went in to pick up waited 20 minutes before I was even asked if I was helped then I signed for my order because I paid over the phone then waited an hour to be told my order wasn’t ready and they didn’t even see my order so I wasted an hour and half and still walked out without my pizza👎🏽

Great local spot! The buffalo chicken rolls are awesome and always great to start with. Any of their stuffed jerk chicken meals are amazing and I would highly recommend the stuffed jerk chicken with shrimp mac. Their cocktails are also great! They're beautifully crafted and taste great. They're always cooking and mixing up new dishes and drinks here!
Food was AMAZING! Service was great enjoyed the music & drinks. Will definitely be returning soon

Be careful ordering delivery from here! Ordered on Postmates. The receipt on bag was the correct order, but no items inside were correct. Zero of our three items were sent. Jerk fish instead of jerk chicken.

Food was great.. Bomb on everything 💯 From stuffed mac shrimp and chicken to jerk catfish to Lamb chops!! Dressing a hit.. mac & cheese good.. cabbage fye.. everything good.. lil pricey but worth it..
Great food and drinks. A little miscommunication but nothing crazy. Worth coming. Get the shrimp Mac jerk!

The wait staff was horrible. We spent 2 hours waiting for a table only to be ignored, having to wave down our waitress. Salmon salad was served with packaged dressing which was a shame because salmon was cooked to perfection.😔
